issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Right now, set operator needs to run in CBO. If a view contains a set op, it will throw exception. We need to support view creation in CBO.

fields.summary: create view on subquery_exists_having may not work well with unparseTranslator

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open
